Service.Name: WMS
Service.Title: Finnish Meteorological Institute Open Data Web Map Service
Service.Abstract: Finnish Meteorological Institute Open Data Web Map Service provides INSPIRE View Service along with radar data.

Layer.Title: Finnish Meteorological Institute Open Data Web Map Service
Layer.Abstract: Finnish Meteorological Institute Open Data Web Map Service provides INSPIRE View Service along with radar data.

Layer.Name: Mare:sea-surface-salinity-forecast
Layer.Title: Sea surface salinity forecast from HBM sea current model

Style.Name: sea-surface-salinity
Style.Title: Colormap style sea surface salinity (per mille)
Style.Abstract: Colormap style for sea surface salinity in the Baltic sea. Features dual color scales for 40-10 per mille and for 8-1 per mille salinities

Layer.Name: Mare:sea-surface-temperature-forecast
Layer.Title: Sea surface temperature forecast from HBM sea current model

Style.Name: sea-surface-temperature
Style.Title: Colormap style sea surface temperature
Style.Abstract: Colormap style for sea surface temperature between -20 and +20 °C with temperatures around 0 highlighted.
